meanings.definition: A substance that stops bleeding when applied to a wound.
meanings.sent1: I used a styptic on the cut to make it stop bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The nurse applied a styptic to the wound to help it heal.
meanings.sent3: The styptic worked like magic on the small cut.
meanings.sent4: The styptic was like a superhero swooping in to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The styptic acted quickly to halt the bleeding.

meanings.definition: Having the property of stopping bleeding.
meanings.sent1: The styptic powder was effective in stopping the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The styptic pencil is known for its ability to stop bleeding.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her styptic touch could stop any bleeding.
meanings.sent4: His words had a styptic effect on the heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The styptic nature of the medicine was evident in its quick action.
